resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/72887</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>72887</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>6283fed6-6805-4f44-80ee-53ad0a493dbf#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A sejtek lebontó folyamatai</string>
            <string language="en">Destructive processes of cells</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zerstörende Prozesse der Zellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Processus destructifs des cellules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Processos destrutivos das pilhas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Processi distruttivi delle cellule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταστρεπτικές διαδικασίες των κυττάρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Procesos destructivos de células</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szerves anyagok (szénhidrátok, zsírok, fehérjék) lebontási folyamatainak áttekintő vázlata; a biológiai oxidáció és az erjedés</string>
            <string language="en">Overlooking sketch of organic matters' (hydrates of carbon, fats, proteins) destructive processes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">biokémia,  lebontó folyamat,  biológiai oxidáció,  erjedés,  </string>
            <string language="en">biochemistry, destructive process, biological oxidation, fermentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übersehenskizze der organischen zerstörenden 
Prozesse der Stoffe (Hydrate des Carbons, der Fette, der Proteine)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Croquis donnant sur des processus destructifs 
organiques des sujets (hydrates de carbone, de graisses, de 
protéines)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esboço negligenciando de processos destrutivos 
orgânicos de matérias (hydrates do carbono, das gorduras, das 
proteínas)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbozzo di trascuranza dei processi distruttivi 
organici degli argomenti (idrati di carbonio, di grassi, di proteine)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράβλεψη του σκίτσου των καταστρεπτικών διαδικασιών 
των οργανικών ουσιών (ένυδρες ουσίες του άνθρακα, λίπη, 
πρωτεϊ'νες)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bosquejo que pasa por alto de los procesos 
destructivos orgánicos de las materias (hidratos del carbón, de las 
grasas, de las proteínas)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biochemie, zerstörender Prozeß, biologische Oxidation,
Gärung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biochimie, processus destructif, oxydation biologique, 
fermentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biochemistry, processo destrutivo, oxidação 
biológica, fermentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biochimica, processo distruttivo, ossidazione 
biologica, fermentazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιοχημεία, καταστρεπτική διαδικασία, βιολογική οξείδωση, 
ζύμωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bioquímica, proceso destructivo, oxidación 
biológica, fermentación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">16-17</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>72887</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=6283fed6-6805-4f44-80ee-53ad0a493dbf&v=1&b=5</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
